headline: Coterra and Devon reportedly in advanced merger talks
summary: Investing.com -- Coterra Energy Inc. and Devon Energy Corp. are in advanced discussions about a potential merger that could be announced in the coming days, according a Bloomberg report Thursday.

raw.headline: Coterra and Devon reportedly in advanced merger talks

headline: Devon Energy Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
summary: Although Devon Energy has underperformed the S&P 500 Index over the past year, analysts remain cautiously optimistic about its long-term prospects.
